title: Land of hype and glory
creator_credit: Films Incorporated, Karen Lerner and Tom Priestly
brief_description: This film focuses on two markets - literary and cinema - to show how the public is manipulated by extravagant promotion. Many tools are used by publishers to help create best-sellers, and movie hype is big business.
